refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the error from previous IRCG operation

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ircg_fetch_error_msg returns the error from a failed connection.

note.para: Error code is stored in first array element, error text in second. The error code is equivalent to IRC reply codes as defined by RFC 2812.
